examples: The buyer backed out of the deal the day before they were due to sign the contract.
Sellers have upped the ante in this area so much that first-time buyers can no longer afford it.
Here is why home buyers end up losing their shirt.
The buyers wanted to bring the price down from $15,000 to $10,000, so I offered to meet them halfway at $12,500.
They knew that, as a going concern, the cafe would command a higher price with prospective buyers.
words.defineEn: a person who wants to buy something, usually an expensive item
words.defineVi: một người muốn mua một cái gì đó, thường là một mặt hàng đắt tiền

examples: There is no remorse for it.
Representative Ted Lieu of California also pointed to the former president's lack of any public remorse over the violence.
Psychopathy is a personality disorder exhibiting egotistical traits, persistent antisocial behavior, and lack of empathy and remorse.
I am a Stefano Sollima and I’m the director of Without Remorse.
They exploit others for their own gain, and they have no remorse about the mean things that they do.
words.defineEn: a sense of great regret that one feels as a result of having done something bad or wrong
words.defineVi: một cảm giác hối tiếc lớn mà một người cảm thấy như là kết quả của việc làm điều gì đó xấu hoặc sai

words.phonetic: tə lɪv wɪðɪn wʌn bækslæʃ ɛs miːnz
words.defineEn: to spend no more money than one has
words.defineVi: không tiêu nhiều tiền hơn một người có

words.phonetic: tə kiːp tɹæk ʌv ɛsbiː slæʃ ɛstiːeɪtʃ
words.defineEn: to ensure that one has the latest news or data concerning someone or something
words.defineVi: để đảm bảo rằng một trong những tin tức mới nhất hoặc dữ liệu liên quan đến một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The rest of his money went into medical expenses.
My friends all had a good laugh, but at my expense.
The document was printed at the taxpayer's expense.
Her fame was bought at the expense of her marriage.
He built up the business at the expense of his health.
words.defineEn: the amount of money spent to do or have something
words.defineVi: số tiền chi tiêu để làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: The goalie saved Johnson's long-range shot.
Save data frequently.
But a truck driver saved her bacon.
Save your breath, Tom.
To save a penalty.
words.defineEn: to keep money to spend later
words.defineVi: để giữ tiền để chi tiêu sau này

examples: She regularly appears on TV.
They both gave regularly to charity.
We donate blood regularly at the hospital to help those in need.
Lisa hits the gym regularly to stay in shape and maintain her physical fitness.
We recommend you save regularly by clicking on the update button.
words.defineEn: at regular intervals or with the same amount of time between events
words.defineVi: tại các khoảng thời gian đều đặn hoặc với cùng một khoảng thời gian giữa các sự kiện

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
Our efforts are finally paying dividends.
Not paying attention.
They both pay their employees badly.
No one paid them any attention.
words.defineEn: to give someone money in exchange for goods or services
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó tiền để đổi lấy hàng hóa hoặc dịch vụ

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
Come on, Bill.
The bill has the President's seal of approval.
The bill was four votes shy of a majority.
His parents footed the bill for his college education.
words.defineEn: a piece of printed paper that shows the amount of money a person has to pay for the meal they have had in a bar or restaurant
words.defineVi: một mảnh giấy in cho thấy số tiền một người phải trả cho bữa ăn họ đã có trong một quán bar hoặc nhà hàng

words.defineEn: in a way that contains all that is wanted, needed, or is  possible, without any omissions
words.defineVi: theo cách có chứa tất cả những gì muốn, cần hoặc có thể, không có bất kỳ thiếu sót nào

words.defineEn: to have a hard time managing one's expenses
words.defineVi: gặp khó khăn trong việc quản lý chi tiêu của một người

words.defineEn: to owe a lot of money to others
words.defineVi: nợ rất nhiều tiền cho người khác
